data.description:
Noda is the pioneer productivity app for immersive ideation individually and in teams.

Access the free version of Noda for an innovative and unique creative experience. Use simple voice and gesture controls to map out your ideas. Pull images from your favorite web pages with multiple web browsers and see your ideas take shape around you.

The optional upgrade Noda Core experience takes you to the next level with unlimited maps and nodes. Import and Export data from CSV files. Push your mind maps directly to the web to share them with people outside of VR, or invite others to join you in your evolving conceptual universe.

Access unlimited cloud services, export hosting, first-look features, and deluxe environments with the Noda Plus subscription. Noda Plus now includes web integration API access, so you can build custom visualizations.

Updated for Meta Quest Pro: mixed reality with color passthrough & spatial anchors. Gaze responsive zoom and notes viewing using eye tracking.

changelog.change_log: Added button hints for Quest 3, fixed crash when expanding and collapsing nodes with certain arrangements, upgraded AI to GPT-4o
Fixed an issue with the in-app browser that inhibited the Noda Integration API from working (including Miro Integration)

Fixed an issue with audio shutting off after playing a video in a browser window.
Fixed an issue with speech-to-text using an external microphone.

Conversational AI on wrist watch: bring to mouth to speak and remove to execute. Ask it for help creating nodes or re-ogranizing
2 new environments: Stage for Core and WorldRoom for Plus
New Upgrade/Account page
Notes Preview window is pin-able
AI Integration for brainstorming, decision-making and visualization.

Meta Quest Pro update with Color Passthrough, Face/Eye tracking for Meta Avatar recording. Eye tracking for auto-zoom of text/images at a distance and preview notes up close. Spatial Anchors for Quest 2 & Pro.
